welcome_message_body: Welcome to Higashiyamato, Japan! Explore our charming city known for its rich history, beautiful temples, and stunning natural scenery. We hope you enjoy your time here and make wonderful memories.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Atsugi NAS Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Atsugi NAS Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Haneda Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal at Haneda Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.
